mapper.select:
select m.no as no, c.no as customerno, m.name as name, m.accountno as accountno, c.point as point from customer c join member m on c.member_no = m.no
where m.no = #{no}
select count(*) from purchaselist p join cvstoreproduct c on p.cvstoreproduct_no = c.no where p.customer_no = #{no} and ROUND((c.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) > 0
select count(*) from purchaselist p join cvstoreproduct c on p.cvstoreproduct_no = c.no where p.customer_no = #{no}
select count(*) from purchaselist p join cvstoreproduct c on p.cvstoreproduct_no = c.no where p.customer_no = #{no} and ROUND((c.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) <= 0

select B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select distinct(c.no), c.name, c.storecode, c.latitude, c.longitude, c.address, c.brand, calc_distance(#{lat},#{lon},c.latitude,c.longitude) as distance from cvstore c join cvstoreproduct cv on c.no = cv.cvstore_no join productlist p on p.no = cv.productlist_no where p.name like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' and p.maincategory like '%'||#{mainCategory}||'%' and p.subcategory like '%'||#{subCategory}||'%' and cv.enrollment = 1 and ROUND((cv.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) > 0 ) A ) B where rnum between #{pagingDTO.startNum} and #{pagingDTO.endNum}

select count(distinct(c.no)) as cnt from cvstore c join cvstoreproduct cv on c.no = cv.cvstore_no join productlist p on p.no = cv.productlist_no where p.name like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' and p.maincategory like '%'||#{mainCategory}||'%' and p.subcategory like '%'||#{subCategory}||'%' and cv.enrollment = 1 and ROUND((cv.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) > 0

select p.name as name, p.no as productcode, p.maincategory as maincategory, p.subcategory as subcategory, p.price as price, c.no as no, c.enrollment as enrollment, c.warehousingdate as warehousingdate, c.expirationdate as expirationdate, ROUND((c.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) as countTime from cvstoreproduct c join productlist p on c.productlist_no = p.no join cvstore cvs on c.cvstore_no = cvs.no where cvs.no = #{cvstore_no} and p.name like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' and p.maincategory like '%'||#{mainCategory}||'%' and p.subcategory like '%'||#{subCategory}||'%' and c.enrollment = 1 and ROUND((c.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) > 0
mapper.update: update customer set point = point + #{point} where member_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select distinct(subcategory) from productlist where maincategory like '%'||#{mainCategory}||'%'

select B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select p.no, p.cvstoreproduct_no as cvstoreproductno, p.customer_no as customerno, p.purchaseprice as purchaseprice, p.purchasedate as purchasedate, pl.name, pl.productcode, pl.price, p.discountprice, pl.maincategory, pl.subcategory, cp.expirationdate as expirationdate from purchaselist p join customer c on c.no = p.customer_no join cvstoreproduct cp on cp.no = p.cvstoreproduct_no join productlist pl on pl.no = cp.productlist_no where p.customer_no = #{customer_no} and ROUND((cp.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) > 0 order by p.purchasedate desc ) A ) B where rnum between #{pagingDTO.startNum} and #{pagingDTO.endNum}

select B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select p.no, p.cvstoreproduct_no as cvstoreproductno, p.customer_no as customerno, p.purchaseprice as purchaseprice, p.purchasedate as purchasedate, pl.name, pl.productcode, pl.price, p.discountprice, pl.maincategory, pl.subcategory, cp.expirationdate as expirationdate from purchaselist p join customer c on c.no = p.customer_no join cvstoreproduct cp on cp.no = p.cvstoreproduct_no join productlist pl on pl.no = cp.productlist_no where p.customer_no = #{customer_no} order by p.purchasedate desc ) A ) B where rnum between #{pagingDTO.startNum} and #{pagingDTO.endNum}

select B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select p.no, p.cvstoreproduct_no as cvstoreproductno, p.customer_no as customerno, p.purchaseprice as purchaseprice, p.purchasedate as purchasedate, pl.name, pl.productcode, pl.price, p.discountprice, pl.maincategory, pl.subcategory, cp.expirationdate as expirationdate from purchaselist p join customer c on c.no = p.customer_no join cvstoreproduct cp on cp.no = p.cvstoreproduct_no join productlist pl on pl.no = cp.productlist_no where p.customer_no = #{customer_no} and ROUND((cp.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) <= 0 order by p.purchasedate desc ) A ) B where rnum between #{pagingDTO.startNum} and #{pagingDTO.endNum}

select p.name as name, p.no as productcode, p.price as price, cs.manager_no as managerno, c.cvstore_no as cvstoreno, c.no as no, c.warehousingdate as warehousingdate, c.expirationdate as expirationdate, c.enrollment, ROUND((c.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) as countTime from cvstoreproduct c join productlist p on c.productlist_no = p.no join cvstore cs on c.cvstore_no = cs.no where c.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update customer set point = point - #{purchasePrice} where no = #{customerno}
mapper.insert: insert into purchaselist values (purchaselist_no_seq.nextval,#{customerno},#{cvsproductno},#{purchasePrice},( select p.price from productlist p join cvstoreproduct c on p.no = c.productlist_no where c.no = #{cvsproductno})-#{purchasePrice} ,sysdate)
mapper.update: update cvstoreproduct set enrollment = 2 , sellday = sysdate where no = #{no}
update cvstore set profit = profit + #{discountPrice} where no = #{cvstoreno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id} and accountType=0
select nvl(A.totaldiscountprice,0) from (select sum(p.discountprice) as totaldiscountprice from purchaselist p join customer c on c.no = p.customer_no where c.no = #{no}) A

SELECT COUNT(cvs.brand) as cntPerBrand, cvs.brand as brand FROM cvstore cvs JOIN cvstoreproduct cvsp on cvs.no = cvsp.cvstore_no JOIN productlist p on cvsp.productlist_no = p.no JOIN purchaselist pl on pl.cvstoreproduct_no = cvsp.no JOIN customer c on c.no = pl.customer_no WHERE c.no = #{customerNo} GROUP BY cvs.brand

SELECT COUNT(p.maincategory) as cntPerCategory, p.maincategory as mainCategory FROM cvstore cvs JOIN cvstoreproduct cvsp on cvs.no = cvsp.cvstore_no JOIN productlist p on cvsp.productlist_no = p.no JOIN purchaselist pl on pl.cvstoreproduct_no = cvsp.no JOIN customer c on c.no = pl.customer_no WHERE c.no = #{customerNo} GROUP BY p.mainCategory
